title: Stray Sheep: Poe no Chicchana Daibouken
synopsis: Stray Sheep is based on the tales of Poe, a naïve, independent and curious ram who finds himself sleepwalking into the most unpredictable situations on his path to reuniting with his herd and finding the “ewe” of his dreams.
staff: [['Yusa, Mimori', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
